articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets President of International Ice Hockey Federation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets President of International Ice Hockey Federation
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Rene Fasel, president of the International Ice Hockey Federation, and his companion, who paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Brazilian Ambassador
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Brazilian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), met and had a talk with Roberto Colin, Brazilian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him on Monday.

articles.title: Greetings to C.C., People's Party of Cambodia
articles.content:
Greetings to C.C., People's Party of Cambodia
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Monday sent a message of greeting to the Central Committee of the People's Party of Cambodia on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of its founding.
					 The message said the party since its foundation has made big successes in the work to realize the national reconciliation and unity and achieve the prosperity of the country.
					
					 Expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would steadily develop on good terms, the message wished the People's Party of Cambodia greater successes in the activities to strengthen the party and build prosperous Cambodia.

articles.title: North Side Preparatory Committee for Holding Great Nationwide Meeting for Reunification Formed
articles.content:
North Side Preparatory Committee for Holding Great Nationwide Meeting for Reunification Formed
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The north side preparatory committee was formed here on Monday to successfully push forward a great national conference for reunification.
					 Upon the authorization of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, a vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was appointed as chairman of the preparatory committee and leading officials of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations as vice-chairpersons and members.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to take practical measures for realizing the great nationwide meeting for reunification in close cooperation with the authorities, political parties, organizations and reputed figures in south Korea and abroad.
					
					 Information bulletin on activities of the north side preparatory committee is to be issued.

articles.title: Open Letter to Authorities, Political Parties, Organizations and Individuals of S. Korea and Overseas
articles.content:
Open Letter to Authorities, Political Parties, Organizations and Individuals of S. Korea and Overseas
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The north side preparatory committee for the joint conference of political parties and organizations and individual personages in north and south of Korea and overseas for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula Monday sent an open letter as regards the holding of a great national conference for reunification on the occasion of the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation to the south Korean authorities including chiefs of offices of Chongwadae, the prime minister, ministers and vice-ministers, officials concerned of the south Korean National Assembly including Chairman Jong Se Gyun, Vice-Chairmen Pak Ju Son and Sim Jae Chol, leading officials of the Minju Party, the Saenuri Party, the Party of People and the Party of Justice of south Korea, chief vice-chairman of the Advisory Council for Democracy and Peaceful Unification of south Korea, the president of the Red Cross of south Korea, heads of local autonomous bodies of south Ko
					 rea, the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and other reunification movement organizations, religious and civic and public organizations, socio-cultural and economic cooperative organizations, Ri Hui Ho, Rim Tong Won, Pak Ji Won, Jong Se Hyon, Jong Tong Yong, Ri Jong Sok, Ri Jae Jong and others related to the Pyongyang meeting, more than a hundred of famous individuals and overseas compatriotic organizations and personages.
					
					 The open letter said that the new line and policies for national reunification set forth at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea reflected the firm faith and will to put an end to the 70 odd-year-long history of separation and open up a new era of reunification and prosperity for glorifying the dignity and honor of the Korean nation over the world.
					
					 The letter noted that it is the steadfast will of the north that whoever is keenly aware of the value of destiny and future of the nation should accept the north's sincere and innovative initiative and proposals to put an end to the extreme confrontation between compatriots, achieve peace and stability of the Korean peninsula and independently open up a way for national reunification by the concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 It is the invariable stand of the DPRK that anyone who cherishes national conscience even a bit, even if he or she used to oppose reunification, can turn over a new leaf as a companion on the road of reunification, the letter said.
					
					 It noted that the DPRK's opinion is to hold in Pyongyang or Kaesong a great national conference for reunification to be participated in by the authorities of the north and the south and representatives of the political parties and organizations and figures of various strata at home and abroad before and after August 15 this year, the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation, and call it a joint conference of the political parties, organizations and personages in the north and the south and abroad for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 If the south side offers a constructive opinion on the matters concerned such as the period, place, participants and agenda item for discussion of the joint conference, the DPRK has full will to examine them without reserve and accept them, the letter said.
					
					 Regarding that it is an urgent task to form preparatory committees for practically pushing forward the holding of a joint conference in every region and form a joint national preparatory committee on the basis of it, the DPRK hoped that the work for implementing them would be soon started in the south side and abroad and made a proposal for holding a working-level contact related with the formation of the joint national preparatory committee comprising delegates from the north and the south and abroad within July at a place to be agreed upon, the letter noted.
					
					 The letter expressed belief and expectation that the south Korean authorities, and political parties, organizations and reputed figures at home and abroad would positively respond to the DPRK's sincere proposals and measures, being well aware of their duty before the era and nation in the present crucial phase.

articles.title: DPRK Blasts U.S. for Moving to Tighten Financial Sanctions on It
articles.content:
DPRK Blasts U.S. for Moving to Tighten Financial Sanctions on It
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Coordinating Committee of the DPRK on Anti-Money Laundering and Combating the Financing of Terrorism gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA on Monday as regards the fact that the U.S. and other hostile forces are attempting to tighten financial sanctions on the DPRK by setting in motion the FATF-Style Body: 
					 The plenary meeting of the Financial Action Task Force on Anti-Money Laundering held in Pusan, south Korea on June 24 adopted a public statement absurdly accusing the DPRK of posing a "threat" to the international financial system and again putting it on the list of "targets of countermeasure".
					
					 The DPRK strongly denounces the statement as an inhumane act of the hostile forces to encroach upon the DPRK's sovereignty and right to existence.
					
					 The reckless moves of the U.S. and other hostile forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK and "bring down its social system" have now reached the phase of abusing even the FATF-Style Body.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the so-called public statement undisguisedly cried out for blocking banking channels to the DPRK under the pretext of the "threat of WMDs proliferation" from it, not mentioning even a word about the positive action steps being taken by it to abide by the international standard under an agreement between it and the FATF-Style Body.
					
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces have gone so sordid as to put the FATF-Style Body under their control, prompted by their sinister politically-motivated purpose to block the cooperative relations developing favorably between the DPRK and the FATF-Style Body and to expand their financial sanctions against the DPRK worldwide.
					
					 From the consistent stand on anti-money laundering and combating the financing of terrorism, the DPRK has established the regular state system such as setting up the Financial Supervisory Bureau and the Financial Intelligence Agency for anti-money laundering in line with the international standard and adopting the Law of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Financing of Terrorism. It also acceded to the International Convention for the Suppression of the Financing of Terrorism and recently to the United Nations Convention against Transnational Organized Crime.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever continue cooperation with the FATF-Style Body while taking positive steps for anti-money laundering and combating the financing of terrorism but will never allow the U.S. and other hostile forces to abuse the FATF-Style Body for their sinister politically-motivated purposes.

articles.title: Korea Space Association Organized in DPRK
articles.content:
Korea Space Association Organized in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Korea Space Association came into being in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, commencing its operation.
					 The association is a non-governmental organization that groups scientists and technicians, university teachers and researchers engaged in the field of space technology and its application.
					
					 Its mission is to promote the peaceful development and utilization of space, a wealth common to mankind, through brisk academic exchanges at home and abroad.
					
					 According to its Chairman Ri Won Chol, vice-president of Kim Chaek University of Technology, the association will sponsor the seminar on space science and technology-2016 in November as its first action program.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The theme of seminar, to be held divided into space materials and elements, basic science, applied technology, social science and other sections, is "The Building of Civilized Socialist Power and the DPRK's Space Science and Technology". 
					
					 Presented to it will be papers on the validity and vitality of the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government for the peaceful space development, the interpretation of home and foreign space-related laws and the technology of computer-aided analysis into satellite images on natural disasters, forest distribution, crop harvest and fishing-ground situation.
					
					 Ri expressed the association's willingness to closely cooperate with space-related international bodies and aerospace organizations of other countries on the principles of equality, reciprocity and mutual replenishment and perfection.

articles.title: Special Envoy of Namibian President Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Namibian President Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah, deputy prime minister and minister of International Relations and Cooperation of Namibia, gave a reception on Monday as regards her visit to the DPRK.
					 Present at the reception on invitation were Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho and officials concerned.
					
					 The party of the special envoy including Selma Ashipala Musavyi, permanent secretary of the Ministry of International Relations and Cooperation, was present there.

articles.title: Special Envoy of Namibian President Departs
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Namibian President Departs
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Netumbo Nandi－Ndaitwah, deputy prime minister and minister of International Relations and Cooperation of Namibia, who is a special envoy of the Namibian president, and her party left here for home Monday.

articles.title: President of International Ice Hockey Federation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
President of International Ice Hockey Federation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Rene Fasel, president of the International Ice Hockey Federation, and his companion visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the story of the old home, where Kim Il Sung was born and spent his childhood cultivating great intention of the revolution, the guests looked round the historical relics preserved there with much care.
					
					 They also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Ice Rink, the Mirim Riding Club, etc.

articles.title: President of International Ice Hockey Federation Leaves
articles.content:
President of International Ice Hockey Federation Leaves
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Rene Fasel, president of the International Ice Hockey Federation, and his companion left here on Monday.

articles.title: Ethiopian Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Ethiopian Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia headed by President Gelta Ermiyas Mathewos   arrived here on Monday.

articles.title: New Posters Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
New Posters Produced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Posters were produced in the DPRK to inspire its service personnel and people to implement the tasks set forth at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Among them are posters on the themes "Let all turn out in the struggle to carry out the decision advanced at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea!" "Let all become honorable victors in the 200-day campaign!" "Let's thoroughly implement the five-year strategy for the state economic development!" and posters on the themes "Party calls!" and "General offensive for the complete victory of socialism by waging a dynamic drive for creating Mallima speed!"
					
					 The poster on the theme "Let's devotedly defend all-people struggle for implementing decision made at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with strong arms!"

articles.title: Many Cage-net Fish Farms Appear in Rivers of DPRK
articles.content:
Many Cage-net Fish Farms Appear in Rivers of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea further encourages the cage-net fish farming, which was commenced on a full scale in 2013.
					 According to an official concerned, more than 1,000 cage-net fish farms have appeared in rivers and lakes across the country and they are run by an integrated control system and powered by solar and other natural energies.
					
					 In the capital city of Pyongyang, 54 cage-nets for fish breeding were displayed in the Taedong and Pothong rivers. 
					
					 Jagang Province established 47 cage-net fish farms in the Chongchon River and other rivers and lakes and Kumchon County of North Hwanghae Province 24 in the Ryesong River.
					
					 Such home-made cage-nets can be seen in reservoirs and lakes in other parts of the country.
					
					 The DPRK has directed big efforts to putting pisciculture on a scientific and intensive basis so as to better the citizens' diet.

articles.title: Production with Locally Available Materials Encouraged
articles.content:
Production with Locally Available Materials Encouraged
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A dynamic drive is under way to produce foodstuffs and consumer goods with locally available materials in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 Amid the reconstruction of six foodstuff factories, including the Pyongyang Vegetable Processing Factory and Songyo Foodstuff Factory, being pushed forward, measures have been taken to supply foodstuff factories with materials on a regular basis.
					
					 Efforts are being paid to establishing a sugar cane processing line as well as to building the Pyongyang Bag Factory with a capacity of hundreds of thousands of rucksacks.
					
					 It has been promoted to raise the proportion of locally available materials in producing school things with the completion of a line for making eraser with vinyl chloride.
					
					The Taedonggang Paint Factory was recently equipped with new facilities.
					
					 A production process based on anthracite gasification made its appearance at the Songyo Ceramic Factory and the Pyongyang Ceramic Factory is being remodeled.
					
					 And the work to develop world-famous products and commodities is getting momentum.

articles.title: Immediate Halt to Reckless Military Provocations Demanded
articles.content:
Immediate Halt to Reckless Military Provocations Demanded
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The military provocations being perpetrated by the south Korean puppet military warmongers in the Han River estuary and hotspot waters of the West Sea at the instigation of the U.S. imperialists are touching off strong protest and condemnation by the public at home and abroad.
					 Much upset by this, the U.S. imperialists and the puppet military warmongers are going so foolish as to justify their military provocations in the waters and evade the responsibility for the tense situation.
					
					 When the north side's statement was released to slam their reckless military provocations, the puppet Ministry of Defense claimed that "north's assertion about the military provocations was far-fetched" and even spouted sheer sophism that its "operation" was a "just activity going through the legal procedure of the Armistice Agreement (AA)" to check illegal fishing of Chinese boats.
					
					 This is the height of impudence and shamelessness.
					
					 The AA much touted by the puppet forces was reduced to a dead document long ago as it lost its validity.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have scrapped all the provisions of the AA by escalating military tension on the Korean peninsula for the past more than six decades.
					
					 They opened to public their scenario for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK and have introduced various type nuclear war hardware into south Korea, rendering the situation to extremely tense. These acts are the most wanton violation and abrogation of all provisions of the AA.
					
					 The puppet forces are shameless enough to say this or that about the AA as they are not the party to the AA.
					
					 They must be aware of elementary things before reeling off a litany of sophism though they are experts at telling lies and making hypocritical talk.
					
					 It is stipulated in Paragraph G of the AA "Regulations and the related provision on navigation of civilian ships at the estuary of the River Han" that no military ship and no civilian ship with military personnel and weapons and ammunition aboard and no ship of neutral countries are allowed to enter the River Han estuary without a special permission.
					
					　They should properly know the meaning of "permission" even though the Military Armistice Commission was rendered defunct in history long back. 
					
					 Though their master the U.S. unilaterally notified the DPRK of the above-said "operation" in a bid to prod the puppet forces into military provocations, not a single warship and not a single military person is allowed to enter the estuary of the River Han without an official permission from the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 The south Korean puppet group should know this though it is so keen on provocation and confrontation and so ignorant of things that it is insisting on such far-fetched assertions.
					
					 The military provocations of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet forces  in the River Han estuary and the hotspot waters of the West Sea can never be pardoned as they are deliberate hostile acts to create a pretext for an armed clash between the north and the south at any cost.
					
					 They should stop their reckless military provocations at once, bearing in mind that they may spark off an inescapable retaliatory action from the KPA like the Yonphyong Island shelling incident.

articles.title: Data on U.S. Crimes Committed in Korean War
articles.content:
Data on U.S. Crimes Committed in Korean War
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The 1950-1953 Korean War was the most barbarous war provoked and conducted by the U.S. imperialists against the Korean nation.
					 The figures and facts below clearly show that the U.S. imperialists are a herd of wolves in human skin.
					
					 During the war, the U.S. hurled into it more than two million troops, including one third of its ground force, one fifth of the air force and most of the Pacific fleet and troops of its fifteen allies and Japan and south Korea. And it poured 20 billion dollars of military spending and 73 million tons of war supplies, 11 times those used in the Pacific War.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists dropped on Pyongyang City alone at least 428,000 bombs, more than its population, blustering that they would totally remove 78 cities in the northern half of Korea from the world map.
					
					 In the whole period of the war, flying corps of the U.S. air force made more than 800,000 sorties and those of the marines and navy over 250,000 sorties, delivering bombs 3.7 times those it dropped on the Japan mainland during the Pacific War.
					
					 On the order of the U.S. Joint Chiefs of Staff, they also conducted a germ warfare in the northern half of Korea. In the period from early January to March 1952 alone, they dropped various types of germ bombs in 169 areas on a total of 804 installments with mobilization of hundreds of war planes.
					
					 And the U.S. imperialists used even chemical weapons, prohibited under the international convention, in cities, counties and frontline areas of the DPRK.
					
					 Due to such cruel actions, 1.23 million innocent inhabitants were killed in the northern half of Korea during the war.
					
					 In Sinchon County alone, the U.S. imperialists massacred more than 35,000 citizens, a quarter of its population, in less than two months.
					
					 Such mass killings were made in the southern half of Korea, too. The U.S. imperialists slaughtered at least one million innocent inhabitants under the pretext of "operations for routing communist bandits and arresting all persons in touch with bandits" during the war.
					
					 In the war the U.S. imperialists destroyed more than 18,000 enterprises and financial institutions and 4,878,920 public buildings and houses and reduced 976,900 hectares of cropland into desolate land.
					
					 The Korean people will never forget the barbarity committed by the U.S. imperialists in the last Korean War, but force them to pay dearly for their crimes without fail.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Raps European Arms Sale to South Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Raps European Arms Sale to South Korea
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Britain-Italy munitions joint venture company Agusta Westland delivered the first batch of ordered gunships Wild Cat of AW-159 type to south Korea recently.
					 Air Bus Group, the biggest aerospace industry in Europe, signed a contract on the sale of in-flight tanker A330 MRTT and gunships with south Korea last year.
					
					 MBDA Co. Ltd of Germany signed a contract on the sale of Taurus KEPD 350 cruise missiles with south Korea in 2013 and is mulling its delivery this year.
					
					 The UK has sold a huge amount of military equipment and their parts to south Korea after the 1990s. They  include helicopters for maritime operations, air-to-ship guided  missiles, KDX combat system, naval combat equipment, sonar, fixed flight navigation system, underwater rescue ship and fighter ejection seat.
					
					 Even at this moment many European munitions companies are sitting at the negotiation tables with those concerned of south Korea for sale of bunker busters, drones, 230 mm multiple rocket systems and other war hardware to it.
					
					 This goes to prove that European countries are busy raking up profits, regarding south Korea as a promising arms market in utter disregard of the acute situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The situation on the peninsula is so tense that a thermonuclear war may break out any moment due to the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities' reckless muscle flexing.
					
					 If Europe is concerned even a bit about the security on the peninsula directly linked with global peace, it had better take a proper attitude of making beneficial efforts for the settlement of problems.
					
					 Europe, apt to talk about peace and detente on the peninsula, makes no scruple of selling all type war hardware to the south Korean puppet warmongers hell-bent on the confrontation with the compatriots in the north in pursuit of its own profit.
					
					 This is a blatant challenge to humankind's desire for peace and security and a behavior of seeking self-interest from other's misfortune.
					
					 This brought into light Europe's hypocritical nature of its trumpeting about peace.
					
					 Europe's loudmouthed peace is nothing but a black-hearted propaganda to pursue "its peace and prosperity" while harassing and infringing upon the security and interests of other countries and region.
					
					 This is little different from the U.S. vicious acts of disturbing peace and security.
					
					 Europe had better give up hypocrisy and behave itself if it truly stands for peace.

articles.title: Korean People Will Always Be Invincible: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Korean People Will Always Be Invincible: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday in a joint article stresses that victory is always in store for the revolutionary army and heroic people of the DPRK who are fully equipped with anti-imperialist class consciousness.
					 The article says that the army and people of the DPRK are the strongest in anti-imperialist class consciousness.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Korean revolutionaries have never lowered the slogan of anti-imperialist struggle held by them in the early period of the revolution.
					
					 The anti-imperialist class consciousness of the heroic Korean People's Army and the Korean people is getting more transparent and firm with the replacement of generations and advancement of revolution.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, chieftain of imperialists, have never brought the army and people of the DPRK to their knees.
					
					 They have styled themselves the "only superpower" in the world after the collapse of the socialist system in the world and the end of the Cold War but were compelled to face continuous and serious defeat only in Korea.
					
					 The important secret of all victories recorded in annals of the revolution lies in that the whole army and people of the DPRK are fully equipped with the anti-imperialist revolutionary idea.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea declared at its historic Seventh Congress its steadfast will to train the entire army and all the people to be strong in anti-imperialist class consciousness and thus settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists without fail.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Puppet Authorities' "Diplomacy for Pressurizing North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Puppet Authorities' "Diplomacy for Pressurizing North"
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea, recently branded south Korea's act of begging outsiders for cooperation for pressurizing the DPRK as "diplomacy like going to tiger's den." It means that south Korea achieved successes by conducting "diplomacy for pressurizing the north" with "close countries of the north" on the "stand of going to the den of tiger."
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The "diplomacy like going to tiger's den" is the dirty product of the traitorous "diplomacy for pressurizing the north" by the south Korean puppet authorities aimed to escalate political and military pressure and economic "sanctions" on the DPRK and implement the wild ambition for stifling it in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 Their "diplomacy like going to tiger's den" is the needless act of the under-wits running amuck failing to understand how the world goes around. 
					
					 These days the public in south Korea and international community are of the view that anti-DPRK "sanctions" by the U.S. and its allied forces are ineffective.
					
					 There is a saying "harm set, harm get." The south Korean authorities' "diplomacy for pressurizing the north" drives themselves into the tight corner and mayhem.
					
					 The puppet forces are snubbed and are given cold shoulder everywhere they go.
					
					 It is too natural that the puppet forces bereft of self-respect of the nation suffer disgrace and insult while wandering here and there to hurt the fellow countrymen in the north, lost to shame.
					
					 The puppet forces should bear in mind that they would suffer bitterer shame and external isolation and ruin if they continuously cling to outsiders' apron strings, while failing to know where they stand being obsessed with confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns S. Korean Puppet Forces for Their Military Provocations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns S. Korean Puppet Forces for Their Military Provocations
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Recently the south Korean puppet forces are perpetrating dangerous military provocation at the estuary of the Han River under the pretext of "checking" the illegal fishing by boats of the third country.
					 Heavily armed warships and helicopters are involved in "the Han River operation" for "expelling fishing boats of the third country." 
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun on Monday terms this a reckless military provocation which no preceding puppet regimes have ever dared conduct. This is a premeditated move to turn even the estuary of the Han River into tense waters for provoking a war against the north, not content with the hot spot waters in the West Sea, constant source of war, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Such reckless saber-rattling being conducted by the south Korean puppet warmongers even at the estuary of the Han River can be committed only by those who have already worked out a war scenario. 
					
					 It is a sinister aim of the puppet regime to regard the presence of fishing boats of the third country at the estuary of the Han River as a golden chance to spark off an armed clash between the north and the south at any cost by massing armed forces under the spurious pretext of "checking fishing boats." 
					
					 Any slight military clash in the West Sea may spill over into a total war.
					
					 The above-said muscle flexing at the estuary of the Han River is as foolish an act as jumping into fire with faggot on one's back.
					
					 The DPRK is following with high vigilance every reckless move of the south Korean warmongers to test its self-restraint and is fully ready to shower baptism of fire to punish the provocateurs and send all of them into the bottom of the West Sea.
					
					 If the south Korean regime wants to escape the fate of forlorn wandering spirit, it had better cool its head heated with war hysteria and behave with discretion.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Blames Ruling Party
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Blames Ruling Party
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on June 23 condemned the south Korean ruling conservative party for using the probe into the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster as a political bargaining chip.
					 The editorial referred to the fact that the "Saenuri Party" offered an opposition party a continuous activity of the Ad Hoc Committee for Probing the Truth behind the Ferry Sewol Disaster in return for excluding Chongwadae from the list of the investigation by the committee.
					
					 Saying that the ulterior intention of the "Saenuri Party" is clear, the editorial noted that it is because of the fear of the disclosure of the blunder made by the chief executive.

articles.title: S. Korean People Hold Rally Calling for Probe into Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean People Hold Rally Calling for Probe into Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Over 10 000 south Koreans held an all-people rally in Seoul on June 25 calling for amending the special law on the ferry Sewol disaster, the south Korean internet paper, Voice of People, said.
					 The speakers at the rally denounced the Park Geun Hye regime for allowing the Ad Hoc Committee for Probing the Truth behind the Ferry Sewol Disaster to continue its investigation till June 30, and for going ahead with administrative procedures for the disorganization of the committee without any legal ground.
					
					 At the end of the rally the bereaved families went on a sit-in in front of the building of the puppet government in demand of the withdrawal of the plan to disorganize the committee.

articles.title: Trade Union Members Launch Anti-"Government" Action
articles.content:
Trade Union Members Launch Anti-"Government" Action
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- More than 10,000 members of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) staged an action in Seoul on June 25 protesting against the puppet group of traitors pursuing the unpopular labor rule, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 At the meeting of workers held at Seoul Square the KCTU said it declared the successive all-out strike, all-out action till July in demand of the increase of the minimum wage and abolition of part-time jobs.
					
					 The acting chairman of the KCTU in a speech said that the reality in which only the workers sacrifice for the interests of the businesses and the regime can no longer be tolerated, adding the KCTU would launch an all-out strike, all-out action.
					
					 The chairman of the Samsung Electronic Service Branch under the Metal Workers Trade Union said: We cannot but fight against the mad world.
					
					 Members of the KCTU marched to Chonggye Square where they held a meeting again.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Condemns Police's Sexual Abuse and Violence against Women
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Condemns Police's Sexual Abuse and Violence against Women
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo on June 25 carried an editorial titled "Barbarous sexual abuses and violence rampant under Park Geun Hye 'government'."
					 Two women members of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy were so sexually abused by police, when they stormed the U.S. embassy in Seoul on June 20, the editorial said.
					
					 The editorial said that police took the women away, committing a group sexual abuse.
					
					 The organization expressed the will to stage fierce struggle, such as an over-night demo and meeting, until the police chief is sacked.

articles.title: Opposition Parties of South Korea Demand Dismissal of Chief of "Patriots and Veterans Affairs Agency"
articles.content:
Opposition Parties of South Korea Demand Dismissal of Chief of "Patriots and Veterans Affairs Agency" 
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The floor leaders of the south Korean opposition Minju Party, Party of People and Party of Justice jointly proposed a motion demanding the dismissal of Pak Sung Chun, chief of the "Patriots and Veterans Affairs Agency", according to MBC of south Korea on June 23.
					 Pak reportedly attempted to let the 11th airborne special warfare brigade of the south Korean puppet army stage a "march" along streets of Kwangju City recently on the occasion of June 25, the day when the Korean war broke out. The brigade earned an ill-fame for mercilessly massacring uprisers and citizens during the Kwangju Popular Uprising in May, 1980.
					
					 He deliberately linked the public demand for setting and singing the song "March for Dear Ones" reflecting the desire of the then uprisers as the song of the ceremony marking the May 18 movement for democracy with the DPRK and had turned it down only to trigger off strong public criticism in south Korea.
					
					 Terming his acts a mockery at the Kwangju citizens, the floor leaders urged the "president" to fire him at once.

articles.title: Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting for solidarity with the Korean people took place in Bangladesh on June 22 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea in a speech said:
					
					 The U.S. could not but sign the Armistice Agreement little different from a surrender document on July 27, 1953 after sustaining a defeat in the 3-year war.
					
					 Much water flew under the bridge since then but the U.S. is still working hard to put the whole of the Korean peninsula under its control.
					
					 The U.S. has escalated military tensions on the peninsula while totally denying the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 The DPRK has firmly stood against the U.S. and reliably defended the sovereignty of the country, dignity of the nation and peace and stability in the region and the rest of the world.
					
					 Under the guidance of respected HE Kim Jong Un the Korean people would frustrate all the moves of the U.S. and its followers to stifle the DPRK, and achieve a final victory.
					
					 A statement was read out at the meeting.
					
					 The statement denounced the U.S. imperialists for making desperate efforts to launch a war of aggression again, oblivious of the disgraceful defeat they sustained in the Korean war. It strongly demanded the U.S. drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK and pull back its aggression forces from south Korea at once.

articles.title: Nigerian Body Urges Park Geun Hye to Pay Heed to Warning of DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian Body Urges Park Geun Hye to Pay Heed to Warning of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website on June 21 an article urging Park Geun Hye of south Korea to bear deep in mind the strong warning of the Korean nation.
					 All the Koreans are intensifying on a daily basis the struggle for achieving peace and bringing earlier the reunification of the Korean peninsula and paving a wide avenue to the improvement of north-south relations under the uplifted banner of national independence, the great national unity, the article said, and went on:
					
					 But Park Geun Hye is making useless efforts to stem the trend of the times while crying out for the "north's dismantlement of nukes", touching off criticism and denunciation by the public at home and abroad.
					
					 Her claim that the north's nuclear development is fundamentally blocking the improvement of the inter-Korean relations is a profound confusing of right and wrong.
					
					 The assertion that the north's nukes pose threat to peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world is sheer fabrication and distortion of the essence of the nuclear standoff between the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 Those with sound reason and conscience are sincerely admiring at and supporting the DPRK carving out its destiny while weathering the unreasonable international order and unequal international situation with its independent stand and treasured sword of justice.
					
					 Park is the worst human rights abuser with neither face nor qualifications to talk about human rights as she committed such unethical crime of abducting the DPRK citizens in broad daylight and turned down the strong demand of their parents to send them back by crying out for "free will."
					
					 She had better pay heed to the strong warning of all Koreans, though belatedly.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Slovenia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Slovenia
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A Slovenian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Maribor City on June 22 on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 Igor Jurisic, chairman of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize significant political and cultural events such as remembrance meeting, lecture and film show to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Austria
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- An Austrian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Vienna on June 22.
					 Thomas Losh, general secretary of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of the President and the personality of Marshal Kim Jong Un as the great man on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of demise of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Germany
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Germany on June 22.
					 Michael Koth, chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Nigerian Figure Urges U.S. to Give up Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian Figure Urges U.S. to Give up Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria who doubles as chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, released a statement on June 22 in support of the open letter the participants of the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations sent to the U.S.
					 He fully supported the letter urging the U.S. to clearly understand the desire of the Korean nation and the trend of the times and make an important decision.
					
					 He demanded the U.S. boldly drop its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK, take practical measures for ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula and stop disturbing independent reunification of the Korean nation.
					
					 The U.S. had better respond to the DPRK's fair, peace-loving and sincere appeal, bearing in mind that the unreasonable and arrogant attempt of a country for supremacy faced a miserable end all the time.

articles.title: Lao Newspaper Introduces Korean People's Struggle
articles.content:
Lao Newspaper Introduces Korean People's Struggle
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Lao newspaper Vientiane Times on June 20 in an article titled "DPRK in campaign for grand advance once again" introduced the Korean people performing fresh miracles and feats in the 200-day campaign.
					 The article said:
					
					 All the people in the DPRK have turned out as one in the 200-day campaign for making a breakthrough in carrying out the five-year strategy for the state economic development set forth at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 Now the Korean people are creating the Mallima speed every day with remarkably high enthusiasm and active struggle, registering eye-opening successes on major fronts in building an economic giant.
					
					 The WPK ushered in a new heyday in socialist construction by arousing the entire army and all the people in every period and at every stage of the developing revolution.
					
					 This time, too, the WPK aroused the entire army and all the people to the 200-day campaign, all-people mass movement for building a power, bringing epochal changes in production and construction.

articles.title: Peruvian Personage Assails U.S. Interference in Internal Affairs of DPRK
articles.content:
Peruvian Personage Assails U.S. Interference in Internal Affairs of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Javier Gradin, director of the International Affairs Department of the Ample Front of Peru, released a statement on June 13 denouncing the U.S. imperialists for interfering in the internal affairs of the DPRK.
					 In a statement, he appealed to the world peace-loving progressives not to pardon the U.S. interference in the DPRK. He went on:
					
					 That's because all sovereign states should solve the problems of their own countries and nations in line with their peoples' desire and interests.
					
					 It is utterly a hysterical fit for any third one to hammer its own opinion to the divided nation which is trying to discuss national reunification issue.
					
					 The U.S. had better quit its interference moves.
					
					 Tragic situation occurred in such countries as Iraq, Afghanistan and Libya owing to the U.S. moves.
					
					 We are opposed to the U.S. interference in the sovereign states.
					
					 It is thanks to the outstanding leadership of the great leaders that the DPRK was able to rise from ashes after the Korean war and dynamically advance the building of socialism despite the U.S. moves against it.
					
					 All successes made in the DPRK are the victory and glory of the Korean people that can not be found in other countries.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con Rene Fasel y su comitiva
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con Rene Fasel y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, se reunio el dia 27 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el presidente de la Federacion Internacional de Jockey, Rene Fasel, y su comitiva que le hicieron una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con embajador brasileno
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con embajador brasileno
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- El vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Su Yong, departio el dia 27 con el embajador de la Republica Federativa de Brasil acreditado en Corea, Roberto Colin, quien le hizo una visita de despedida.

articles.title: Formado comite preparatorio norteno para abrir gran acto pannacional de reunificacion
articles.content:
Formado comite preparatorio norteno para abrir gran acto pannacional de reunificacion
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- Quedo constituido el dia 27 en esta capital el comite preparatorio de la parte nortena para impulsar con exito la apertura del gran acto pannacional de  reunificacion.
					  Por encargo de Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, el vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC y los cuadros directivos del gobierno, los partidos politicos y las entidades de la RPDC fueron nombrados, respectivamente, como presidente, vicepresidentes y miembros del comite naciente.
					
					  El comite preparatorio decidio tomar las medidas practicas para iniciar el gran acto pannacional de reunificacion en estrecha relacion con las autoridades, los partidos politicos,  las entidades y las personalidades renombradas del Sur de Corea y en ultramar.
					
					  Se publicara la comunicacion oficial sobre el estado de las actividades del comite preparatorio de la parte nortena.

articles.title: Comite preparatorio norteno de conferencia Conjunta envia cartas a Sur de Corea y ultramar
articles.content:
Comite preparatorio norteno de conferencia Conjunta envia cartas a Sur de Corea y ultramar
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- En cuanto a la apertura del gran acto pannacional para la reunificacion con motivo del 71o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria (15 de agosto de 1945), el comite preparatorio de la parte nortena de la Conferencia Conjunta de todos los partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades individuales del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar para la paz y la reunificacion independiente de la Peninsula Coreana, envio cartas a los jefes de gabinete de Chongwadae, el premier, los ministros, viceministros y otras autoridades del Sur de Corea, el presidente de la Asamblea Nacional, Jong Se Gyun, los vicepresidentes Pak Ju Son, Sim Jae Chol y otros relacionados del parlamento surcoreano, los relacionados importantes del Partido Democratico Dobulo, el Partido Saenuri, el Partido de Pueblo y el Partido Justicia, el primer vicepresidente del consejo consultivo por la democracia, la paz y la unificacion, el presidente de la Sociedad de Cruz Roja del Sur de 
					 Corea, l
					
					 os jefes de las entidades autonomas locales del Sur de Corea, el Comite Sureno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y otras entidades de movimiento por la reunificacion, las otras religiosas, civiles y sociales, las demas sociales, culturales y economicas, asi como Ri Hui Ho, Rim Tong Won, Pak Ji Won, Jong Se Hyon, Jong Tong Yong, Ri Jong Sok, Ri Jae Jong y otros relacionados con la Cumbre de Pyongyang, mas de 100 personalidades individuales ilustres de distintos estratos, las entidades y personalidades coreanas en ultramar por regiones.
					
					La misiva senala que la linea y orientaciones por la reunificacion de la patria, presentadas de nuevo en el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, reflejan la conviccion y voluntad ferreas de abrir la nueva epoca prospera de la reunificacion en que se exalten a todo el mundo la dignidad y el honor de la nacion coreana, al poner fin a la historia de division de mas de 70 anos.
					
					Todas las personas bien conscientes del destino de la nacion coreana y la importancia de su futuro deben aceptar nuestras iniciativas y propuestas sinceras e innovadoras para aliviar el peor estado de la confrontacion fratricida, lograr la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y solucionar el problema de la reunificacion de la patria de manera independiente y con  las fuerzas unidas de la nacion, lo que es nuestra voluntad inconmovible, adelanta la carta y continua:
					
					Nuestra invariable posicion es que pueden hacer una nueva partida como acompanante de la reunificacion quienes tienen un pedazo de la conciencia nacional aunque han venido por el camino anti-reunificacion.
					
					Hemos declarado abrir, antes y despues del 15 de agosto del presente ano, en Pyongyang o en Kaesong un gran acto pannacional con la participacion de los representantes de las autoridades, partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades de distintos estratos del Norte, el Sur y el ultramar y nombrarla como conferencia conjunta de los partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades individuales del Norte, el Sur y el ultramar para la paz y la reunificacion independiente de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Al respecto de la conferencia conjunta si la parte surena presenta criterios constructivos sobre el periodo, el lugar, los nombres de participantes, los puntos de discusion y otros problemas interesados, tenemos la voluntad de revisarlos y aceptarlos con sinceridad.
					
					Inmediatamente, al considerar inminente organizar por regiones los comites preparatorios para impulsar realmente la apertura de la conferencia conjunta y la base de esto constituir el Comite Preparatorio Conjunto Pannacional, deseamos a la parte surena y ultramar que inicien lo mas pronto posible el trabajo para ejecutarla y preponemos sostener en julio, en el  lugar en que se acuerde, el contacto de trabajo sobre la constitucion del Comite Preparatorio Conjunto Pannacional, que integren los delegados del Norte, el Sur y el ultramar.
					
					Expresamos esperanza y conviccion de que las autoridades del Sur de Corea, los partidos politicos, entidades y personalidades renombrados del interior y exterior del pais acepten nuestras propuestas y medidas sinceras, bien conscientes de su deber asumido ante la epoca y la nacion en la coyuntura importantisima de hoy.

articles.title: Portavoz coreano condena intento de recrudecer sancion financiera anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz coreano condena intento de recrudecer sancion financiera anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que Estados Unidos y otras fuerzas hostiles intentan ampliar y recrudecer la sancion financiera sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por conducto de un aparato internacional de supervision financiera, el portavoz del Comite Nacional de Coordinacion de la RPDC sobre el Anti-Lavado de Dinero y Anti-Financiacion del Terrorismo dio el dia 27 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					La reunion plenaria de la Fuerza Atareada Internacional de Accion Financiera sobre la prevencion del lavado de dinero, celebrada el dia 24 en Pusan del Sur de Corea, aprobo una declaracion abierta que fija nuevamente a la RPDC como "pais objeto de contramedida" acusandola de "amenazar" el sistema financiero internacional.
					
					Denunciamos y rechazamos fuertemente esa declaracion que bloquea las transacciones financieras de la RPDC con otros paises, considerandola como crimen de lesa humanidad de las fuerzas hostiles que atentan contra nuestra soberania y derecho a vivir.
					
					Las maniobras imprudentes de las fuerzas hostiles como EE.UU., destinadas a aislar, aplastar y "derrocar el regimen" de la RPDC, han llegado a la fase de abusar hasta del aparato internacional de supervision financiera encargado de prevenir el lavado de dinero.
					
					Lo insoslayable del caso es que en aquel documento no se hizo referencia alguna a las energicas medidas de accion tomadas por la RPDC para cumplir las normas internacionales segun lo acordado con dicho aparato, sino se exigio abiertamente cerrar los canales bancarios conectados con ella bajo el pretexto de la "amenaza de proliferacion de armas de exterminio masivo".
					
					Tales tentativas cobardes de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles parten de su malsano objetivo politico de bloquear las relaciones de cooperacion entre la RPDC y el aparato internacional, que se desarrollan de manera positiva, y ampliar en escala mundial la sancion financiera sobre la RPDC.
					
					Partiendo de la invariable posicion de rechazar el lavado de dinero y la financiacion del terrorismo, hemos establecido un ordenado sistema a lo largo del pais luego de fundar el Buro de Supervision Financiera y el Servicio de Informacion Financiera conforme a la norma internacional y aprobar la ley contra el lavado de dinero y la financiacion del terrorismo.
					
					Ademas, nuestro pais se ha afiliado a la Convencion Internacional para la Supresion de la Financiacion del Terrorismo y recientemente, a la Convencion de la ONU contra el Crimen Organizado Transnacional.
					
					En el futuro tambien, seguiremos cooperando con el aparato tomando activas medidas para combatir el lavado de dinero y la financiacion del terrorismo, pero no permitiremos jamas el intento de EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles de utilizarlo en sus siniestros objetivos politicos.

articles.title: Organizada la Asociacion del Espacio de Corea
articles.content:
Organizada la Asociacion del Espacio de Corea
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea quedo constituida la Asociacion del Espacio de Corea que inicio ya su trabajo.
					La asociacion de nivel civil es compuesta por los cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de aplicacion de tecnologias espaciales, asi como los profesores e investigadores de las universidades.
					
					Tiene por su mision fomentar el desarrollo y uso pacificos del espacio, patrimonio comun de la humanidad, mediante el energico intercambio academico dentro y fuera del pais.
					
					Segun el presidente de la asociacion, Ri Won Chol, quien es vicerrector general de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek, la asociacion auspiciara en noviembre, como su primer proyecto, el Seminario de Ciencias y Tecnicas Espaciales 2016.
					
					El seminario se efectuara dividido en las ramas de materiales y elementos espaciales, ciencia basica, tecnologia de aplicacion, ciencias sociales, etc. y tiene el tema "Construccion de la potencia civilizada socialista y las ciencias y tecnicas espaciales de Corea".
					
					En la ocasion se presentaran los trabajos referentes a la justeza y vitalidad de la politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno de la RPDC sobre el desarrollo espacial con fines pacificos,
					
					Seran publicados los otros sobre el analisis juridico de las leyes espaciales de nuestro pais y los extranjeros y la tecnologia de analisis computarizada de las imagenes enviadas desde satelite artificial sobre los desastres naturales, la distribucion de bosques, el pronostico de rendimientos de cereales, el estado de zonas pesqueras, etc.
					
					Ri declaro la voluntad de estrechar la cooperacion con las organizaciones homologas internacionales y nacionales en el principio de igualdad, beneficio mutuo y complementacion reciproca.
